status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine spent most of the time in a downtime state (37 ten‑minute intervals), with only limited periods contributing to power production; when producing, output was fairly steady around 0.93 (std 0.12) despite moderate wind variability (mean 13.7 m/s, std 1.49). Operational signals show notable variability in rotating speeds (rotor rpm std 1.62; generator rpm std 179) alongside moderate average pitch (~8.2) and yaw misalignment (~8.6). Anomalies include an extreme wind speed maximum of 43.7 m/s and flagged power variability, while the average power residual stayed near zero (~0.01) and temperature averaged ~72.5.
